description: Try our easy to follow Feta-stuffed Capsicum recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Feta-stuffed Capsicum Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Put the feta, garlic, parsley, and black pepper in a mixing bowl and mash together with the back of a fork to form a smooth paste.

Cut the stalk end off the peppers and discard. Carefully deseed the peppers, then stuff with the feta mixture. Brush with oil, then pack tightly into a small baking dish. Spoon over the remaining oil and bake in the oven for 20 minutes, or until the peppers are soft. Serve hot with fresh crusty bread.
